document_data.mainbody:
Strelsi was a small town located along the shores of the Lake of Mists in the Hordelands in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Strelsi was found near the center of the southern shore of the Lake of Mists in between Antoumek to the east and Budennov to the west. It was located approximately  north of the Golden Way.
